title: Data Analytics Excellence
description: Led data analytics initiatives and built robust dbt pipelines for performance reporting across multiple business lines.

testimonial.text: Nasrallah demonstrated exceptional technical skills and analytical thinking during his time at Société Générale. His ability to design and implement complex data pipelines while mentoring junior team members was outstanding.
testimonial.author: Gilles Hubschwerlin
testimonial.position: Quality and Performance Manager, Operations Directorate

title: Healthcare Data Infrastructure
description: Implemented comprehensive cloud and AI infrastructure for secure healthcare data management and analytics.

testimonial.text: Nasrallah's expertise in data analytics and cloud technologies was instrumental in transforming our data infrastructure. His professional approach and technical excellence made him a valuable team member.
testimonial.author: Jerome Filippone
